posts.post_content:
Since I just missed the last T210 Series 3 San Antonio player to be listed for sale by an hour or so, I thought I would put out a call to see if there are any more available.

Looking to buy a T210-3 San Antonio player, any player is fine, for my back series set.  Prefer graded SGC/PSA 1-3 range, but will consider raw cards as long as the card will grade and the back is without significant damage or paper loss.

PM me with any cards you may have for sale.  Thanks.
Dave
